metadata.creator: pizza_poyo (and his brother)
metadata.description:
the (almost) complete XCX bgm file extraction directly from the game disc.
The files (at least for my pc) are considered completely lossless with 0% compression.
Now you can truly enjoy the OST from one of the best WiiU games, I guess :^).

All rights go to Nintendo and Monolith Soft. The main composer is Hiroyuki Sawano. OtherÂ  featured artists include mpi, David Whitaker, Aimee Blackschleger, Mika Kobayashi, Cyua and Sayulee.

metadata.title: Xenoblade Chronicles X Original Soundtrack (WAV and ADX) by pizza_poyo
